question: The 2017 National conference on Communicating India has started in which city?
explanation: The 2017 National conference on Communicating India has held in New Delhi on April 5, 2017. The three main themes for the conference are \'Telling India\'s story to the world\', \'Communicating via Journalism\' and \'Dialogue with Diaspora\'. The one-day conference has been organized by the Vivekananda International Foundation in collaboration with the India Media Centre, University of Westminster, London, Nehru Memorial Museum and Library and the Indian Institute of Mass Communication with the association of Prasar Bharati.
